title: Convert newsletters into AI podcasts with GPT-4o Mini and ElevenLabs
description:
# üéß Convert Unread Newsletters into Conversational AI Podcasts

**Turn email overload into audio insights ‚Äî automatically.**

This workflow transforms unread newsletters sitting in your inbox into engaging, human-like audio conversations between two AI voices. It‚Äôs perfect for listening during your commute, workout, or while multitasking.

Inspired by Google's NotebookLM, this automation brings long-form content to life by summarizing dense text into a natural dialogue using OpenAI and generating high-quality voice narration with ElevenLabs. The result? A dynamic audio file sent right back to your inbox ‚Äî hands-free, screen-free, and stress-free.

---

## üí° What this workflow does

- ‚úÖ Connects to your Gmail inbox to fetch unread newsletters
- ü§ñ Uses GPT-4o Mini to summarize and rephrase content as a conversation
- üó£Ô∏è Sends the dialogue to ElevenLabs to generate voice clips (`voice1` + `voice2`)
- üîÅ Merges all audio segments into a single podcast-like MP3 using FFmpeg
- üì¨ Emails the final audio back to you for easy listening

---

## üõ†Ô∏è What you'll need

- A Gmail account with IMAP enabled
- An OpenAI API key (GPT-4o Mini recommended for cost/performance)
- An ElevenLabs API key + selected voice IDs
- A **self-hosted or local n8n instance with FFmpeg installed**
- Basic knowledge of binary data and audio handling in n8n

---

## ‚ú® Use cases

- Convert long newsletters into hands-free listening experiences
- Repurpose Substack or Beehiiv content for podcast-like distribution
- Build an internal voice dashboard for teams who prefer audio updates

---

## üôå Want to go further?

This workflow is modular and extensible. You can add steps to:

- Upload the final audio to Spotify, SoundCloud, or Telegram
- Publish to a private podcast RSS feed
- Create a daily audio digest from multiple newsletters

---

### üì¨ Contact & Feedback

Need help customizing it? Have ideas or feedback?

Feel free to reach out:  
üì© **Luis.acosta@news2podcast.com**

If you're building something more advanced with audio + AI, like automated podcast publishing to Spotify ‚Äî let me know and I‚Äôll figure out how I can help you!
disclaimer: This workflow is provided as-is. Please review and test before using in production.
